{"name": "Sacred Heart Church,House on the Hill, Clothing Closet and Baby Items", "alternate_name": "", "description": "CLOTHING CLOSET AND BABY ITEMS: House on The Hill provides clothes and small baby items to those in need. Also offers home goods, shoes, and linens.Also accepts donations, which may be dropped off at the donation shed.

Coordinator:  Mila Stanley  -  301-802-5027

milabobftan@verizon.net

no food
